message: Let's split the money, Bob. I think this is a fair deal that gives us both a good amount.
I think we can do better than your initial offer, Alice. Let's try a more even split.
Bob, time is running out and the money is losing value. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more than your last offer.
I see you're willing to compromise, Alice. I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours.
Bob, let's be real. The money is losing value with every round.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both walk away with something.
